name: Spike Volleyball
description: Spikes, blocks, floatersâ€¦ Master the skills and tactics of indoor volleyball! With 50 men's and women's national teams, Spike Volleyball draws you deep into the realistic action of one of the most complex and spectacular team sports played today.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD Phenom II X4 945 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6770 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 10 GB available space Additional Notes: A PC-compatible game controller is required to play Spike Volleyball.
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 10 GB available space Additional Notes: A PC-compatible game controller is required to play Spike Volleyball.
